channel.title: end of world on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in end of world on Barefoot Rob

item.title: dream end of the world
item.description: ##07:57 Sunday 02 December 2012 In a large group of people in different buildings, I was flirting with a cute girl who looked liked she may be from India or Sri Lanka. She had two friends, one of whom looked distinctly American, and I was flirting with her more. The first girl noticed and blew me off in stride, and the second girl said to her girlfriend “I think he likes me” as she went out somewhere.

item.title: ThisIsIt!
item.description: Friday 5:04pm CST 31 December 1999 This is the last day of the nineteens!!!!!! There's the whole debate about, "well, it's not really the millenium or even the century cause way back in the day they started counting with 1 not 0 blahdiddyblah." Yes, I say, but realistically, what is *cool* is seeing those 000 zeros roll up onto the calendar. I mean, driving in the car people don't say oh look!
